name: snap-stream
description: Snap Stream - Live Streaming & Recording Platform

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,MEDIA,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:media" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "BACKEND+MEDIA,FRONTEND" -c "cyan,yellow" "cd backend && npm run start:all" "cd frontend && npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:web: concurrently -n "BACKEND+MEDIA,FRONTEND" -c "cyan,yellow" "cd backend && npm run start:all" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
